mapper.select: SELECT category_id , category_name , category_order FROM good_blog.tb_categorys ca, good_blog.tb_blogs bl WHERE ca.blog_id = bl.blog_id AND bl.user_id = #{owner_id}

SELECT post_id , post_name , category_name , post_content , create_dt FROM good_blog.tb_categorys ca, good_blog.tb_blogs bl, good_blog.tb_posts po WHERE ca.blog_id = bl.blog_id AND ca.category_id = po.category_id AND bl.user_id = #{owner_id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO good_blog.tb_categorys (blog_id, category_name, category_order, use_yn) VALUES ((SELECT blog_id FROM good_blog.tb_blogs WHERE user_id = #{owner_id}), #{category_name}, #{category_order}, 'Y')

INSERT INTO good_blog.tb_posts (category_id, post_name, post_content, create_dt, update_dt, use_yn, thumbnail) VALUES (#{category_id}, #{post_name}, #{post_content}, SYSDATE(), SYSDATE(), 'Y', #{thumbnail})
